person.persName: William Gross (Harlan County farmer and soldier)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer and soldier. Lived in Harlan County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Drucilla Gross. Father of Edmond Gross, Jacob Gross, Elizabeth Gross, and Perline Gross. Served as first lieutenant (Co. D) in the Harlan County Battalion of Kentucky State Militia from October 1862 to January 1863.
